articles.title: ‘I’m glad to be back’: Sheens gets straight to work at Tigers - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: A jet-lagged Tim Sheens was on deck for 9am at Wests Tigers’ Concord HQ, emerging after nine hours of meetings on his first day to give an optimistic summary of the situation at the club.
articles.content: Immortal Andrew Johns, who has come on board to help the Knights, made it clear he was keen to work with Brooks in The Sun-Herald and said: He looks like he needs a change, and getting out of Sydney … [+2347 chars]
